TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PeerCollaboration extends System.Object
public ref class PeerCollaboration abstract sealed

summary.span: 与对等方协作基础结构进行交互。

span.span: Interacts with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

summary.span: 很多核心协作方案都是从此类着手的。

span.span: Many of the core collaboration scenarios begin with this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是一个静态类 – 它是密封的抽象并没有公共构造函数。This class is a static class – it is sealed, abstract and does not have a public constructor. 它用来包含和管理应用程序、 对象和已接受邀请到协作会话的对等节点的状态信息。It is used to contain and manage application, object, and presence information for peers that have accepted invitations to a collaboration session. 在对等节点、 对象和应用程序，方面 PeerCollaboration 类提供了三个访问器中，一个用于每个集合，作为接口或计算机上当前发生的任何其他连接点。In terms of peers, objects, and applications, the PeerCollaboration class provides three accessors, one for each collection, as an interface or point of connectivity for whatever else is happening on the machine. 此类不能被继承;如果此密封的类指定为基的类，将发生编译时错误。This class cannot be inherited; a compile-time error will occur if this sealed class is specified as the base class. 可以为使用方法和属性在此类中：Methods and properties in this class can be used to: - 启动和管理协作应用程序Launch and manage collaborative applications - 注册和删除应用程序和协作对象 （如证书、 图片、 虚拟形象，和的文本描述中）Register and delete applications and collaboration objects (such as certificates, pictures, avatars, and text descriptions) - 邀请加入协作会话，包括诸如范围和对象将在 Internet 上标识它们的对等节点Invite peers to collaboration sessions, including items such as scope and objects which will identify them over the Internet - 允许对等和协作基础结构，管理的联系人的列表，或者将它们的存在发布到每个其他Allow peers to and of the collaboration infrastructure, manage lists of contacts, or publish their presence to each other - 利用属性和事件来协调异步应用程序通信，特别是对于名称、 状态、 应用程序或其他对象中的更改。Utilize properties and events to coordinate asynchronous application communication, especially for changes in name, presence, application, or other objects. "链接-本地云"、"的子网对等使用"，和"网络邻居作用域"是调用的同义词。"Link-local cloud", "subnet of the calling peer", and "NearMe scope" are synonymous terms. "Internet 作用域"和"无服务器存在"是同义词。"Internet scope" and "serverless presence" are synonymous. 站点-本地协作命名空间中具有无等效项。The site-local has no equivalent in the collaboration namespace. 每个方法或此类中的属性的使用要求的。The use of every method or property in this class requires a of . 当对等协作会话开始时，将创建此状态。This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象包含应用程序在远程对等方的协作请求下启动时所需的信息。

span.span: Gets the object that contains information needed when an application is started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer.

value.span: 如果应用程序是在邀请下启动的，将返回一个 对象（其中既包含有关发送应用程序邀请的对等方的信息，也包含邀请本身）；否则将返回 。

span.span: If the application was started due to an invitation, a object that contains both information about the peer that sent the application invitation and the invitation itself is returned; otherwise, is returned.
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是用于通过协作感知实例启动后对其以确定是否已启动远程对等机中的协作请求。This property is to be used by a collaboration-aware instance after it is started to determine whether it was started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer. 调用应用程序应检查和属性以获取更多有关邀请请求的信息。The calling application should inspect the and properties to get further information about the invitation request. 访问此属性需要的。Access to this property requires a of . 此状态时会创建协作会话开始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等对象是自动取消注册 （删除） 从对等协作基础结构时对对象的引用不再有效。Peer objects are automatically unregistered (removed) from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure when a reference to the object is no longer valid. 如果调用方不维护对对象的引用，它是从对等协作基础结构中注销。If a caller does not maintain a reference to the object, it is unregistered from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure. 或者，可以使用此方法手动注册对象。Alternatively, an object can be manually unregistered by using this method. 调用此方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 此状态时会创建协作会话开始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 登录到对等协作基础结构与所需的调用的对等方之前调用此方法的方法。The calling peer is required to sign in to the peer collaboration infrastructure with the method prior to calling this method. 访问此方法需要的。Access to this method requires a of . 此状态时会创建协作会话开始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册应用程序与协作基础结构：The following code example illustrates how to register an application with the Collaboration infrastructure: [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许查询通过参与在其中注册对象的作用域的远程对等节点的对象。This method allows the object to be queried by remote peers participating in the scope in which the object was registered. 如果以前注册的对象，此方法将更新其注册。If the object was previously registered, this method updates its registration. 如果已注册的对象超出范围，它可以检索通过方法。If a registered object falls out of scope, it can be retrieved via the method. 数据部分的大小必须小于或等于 16384 个字节。The size of the data portion of the must be less than or equal to 16,384 bytes. 访问此方法需要的。Access to this method requires a of . 此状态时会创建协作会话开始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

summary.span: 让对等方以指定的 登录协作基础结构。

span.span: Signs the peer into the collaboration infrastructure with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示名称不一定是唯一。Display names are not necessarily unique. 用户应验证标识通过电子邮件、 使用的显示名称的人员的电话，或亲自之前接受协作邀请。Users should verify the identity of the person using the display name by email, phone, or in person before accepting a collaboration invitation. 此函数使用户登录协作基础结构。This function signs the users into the Collaboration Infrastructure. 访问此方法需要的。Access to this method requires a of . 此状态时会创建协作会话开始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以使用户登录协作基础结构。The following code example illustrates how to sign the users into the Collaboration infrastructure. [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#1)]

summary.span: 获取调用对等方可在其中发布状态、功能和对象信息的 。

value.span: 一个 对象，指定调用对等方将参与的范围。

span.span: object that specifies the scope in which the calling peer will participate.
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等主机或主机应用程序可能限制或通过使用单独的作用域区分对等方参与协作活动。The peer host or host application may limit or differentiate peer participation in collaboration activities by using separate scopes. 调用对等方应检查以确定哪些进一步的操作，它可以成功执行此方法的返回值。The calling peer should inspect the return value from this method to determine what further actions it can successfully perform.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void SignOut(valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope peerScope) cil managed

param.name: peerScope
param.span: 由 指定的范围枚举。

span.span: Scope enumeration specified by .

summary.span: 从指定范围注销对等方。

span.span: Signs the peer out of the specified scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是特定于应用程序的操作和注销可能会影响其他应用程序可能在当前运行。This method is not an application-specific operation and signing out may affect other applications that may be currently running. 如果用户尚未登录到指定的范围，则调用此方法会不导致不执行任何操作。If the user is not already signed into the specified scope calling this method results in a no-op. 当用户在注销网络邻居时，从删除其已发布的信息终结点对象集。When a user signs out of People Near Me, their published information is deleted from the endpoint object set. 这包括和，除了任何注册的标识对象的调用的对等协作基础结构。This includes and , in addition to any identifying objects registered by the calling peer into the collaboration infrastructure. 此信息被删除，因为它不再供远程对等节点或对等主机之间的协作。Because this information is deleted, it is no longer available to either remote peers or a peer host for collaboration. 从的角度类，其他共享的受信任的联系人的相同信息并不相关; 使用类不会影响其他对象，此信息已保持不变，例如远程对等方对象。From the perspective of the class, other sharing of the same information with trusted contacts is not relevant; use of the class does not affect other objects in which this information was persisted, such as a remote peer object. 同样，删除对等方不会影响在协作应用程序; 其存在其他联系人是仍可以查看其是否存在并与之进行协作。Likewise, deleting a peer from the does not affect its presence in a collaboration application; other contacts are still able to view its presence and collaborate with it. 调用此方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 此状态时会创建协作会话开始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

span.span: The parameter contains an invalid enumeration value.
The operation could not be completed.

summary.span: 从 基础结构中注销指定的 。

span.span: Unregisters the specified from the infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注销停止接收协作邀请为其调用的对等方。Unregistering a stops the calling peer from receiving collaboration invitations for it. 如果之前未注册应用程序正在取消注册，这不是不执行任何操作。If the application being unregistered was not previously registered, this is a no-op. 调用此方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 此状态时会创建协作会话开始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

exception.span: 指定应用程序的全局唯一 不存在或为空。

span.span: The globally unique for the specified application does not exist or is empty.

span.span: The parameter is not set to a known value in .
